argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mulgnncl.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | mulgnncl.t | |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_id | |- ( G e. Grp -> G e. Grp ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ssid | |- B C_ B |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( G e. Grp -> B C_ B ) |
| 7 | 1, 3 | #P_grpcl | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> ( x ( +g ` G ) y ) e. B ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_grpidcl | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( 0g ` G ) e. B ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` G ) = ( invg ` G ) |
| 11 | 1, 10 | #P_grpinvcl | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ x e. B ) -> ( ( invg ` G ) ` x ) e. B ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 | #P_mulgsubcl | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ N e. ZZ /\ X e. B ) -> ( N .x. X ) e. B ) |
